data.text: @IbbotsonMatty Hello. It is great to hear you are travelling with us! I’m really sorry to hear your baggage is damaged. We can only advise sending your details by email to our baggage team at baggage.claims@fly.virgin.com and our team will update you as soon as possible. ^Tom

urls.description: Hello you. Welcome to Virgin Atlantic. Find our best fares on your next flights to the US and beyond, with a fantastic choice of food, drinks, award winning entertainment and onboard WiFi.

data.text: @NancyKr41006329 If you are flying on a Virgin Atlantic flight then you can use your Virgin Atlantic booking reference to access your booking via the "Manage booking" link on our website https://t.co/mnfpX5S2l2 and select seats. I hope this helps. ^Tom
